## Observation notes  
First documented by Sladen 1919, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000). Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Spencer Entomological Collection, UBC: (C.G. Ratzlaff), 2015, <span class="hl-place-name">Tsawwassen</span>. M. Clausen, Masters thesis: 2017, <span class="hl-place-name">Delta</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Elle), 2005; (Neame), 2007; (Gielens), 2009; (Wray), 2012; (Gillespie), 2015, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. (Gehrels), 2013; (Elle), 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>. (Bobiwash), 2016, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: (Zand), 2021, 2022; (Gadzik), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>; (Cruise), 2022, <span class="hl-place-name">Sunshine Coast</span>; (McDougall), (Lakes), (Wong), (Carmichael), (Lee), 2023, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>, from 2014.
